name: Paranormal Investigation - A Concrete Case
description:
Rumoured paranormal activities in the construction site next door? Even during the day something seems to be happening. How will our junior detective fare with this puzzling case on his hands?

Defeat the ghosts.

Try to stay alive~

//This is game made for our school's Gamejam in the Spring 2017. //We made this to learn more about making games and programming. //Have fun playing.

Credits:

  •  Heikki Väyrynen – Code (Screenwriter)
  • Janessa Aulén - Art
  • Michael Karlsson – Code (AI)
  • Teemu Turku – Code (Boolean master)
